Posts.Content: May 5, 2009 10:16AM Saltire wrote: I have to tell you, my friend had bloody discharge and was told it was nothing to worry about. She had a mammogram-negative.ultrasound-negative.and eventually an MRI and she a 9mm by 4mm mass. She ended up  having a double mastectomy . I am not meaning to scare you but i think all tests etc possible are done when there is a symptom which could turn out to be a cancer before a definate diagnosis is made. Good luck and i hope all turns out ok.
Posts.Title: bloody nipple discharge amybrown MTwoman
